Title: Clipboard Manager
Description: Clipboard Manager handles multiple clipboard entries in a simple and lightweight fasion, just with two global hotkeys. It is system-wide and independent of any particular application. It is developed in C# using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Clipboard Manager handles multiple clipboard entries in a simple and lightweight fasion, just with two global hotkeys. It is system-wide and independent of any particular application. It is developed in C# using WPF.


Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
